unnormalised: My grandmother, Amma, always swore by Ayurveda. Back in Kerala, near Kochi, she’d get her annual panchakarma treatment. Remember that Onam we visited? She felt ten years younger! She’d visit Vaidyaratnam Ayurveda College. Even for minor ailments, Amma would try home remedies like ginger tea with tulsi before popping any pills. She said it was better than a Rs. 500 doctor's visit. Perhaps I should try it again, been feeling off since Diwali.
